products.name: terraform-ibm-icd-redis
products.label: IBM Cloud Databases for Redis module
products.short_description: Implements an instance of IBM Cloud Databases for Redis.
products.long_description: Use this module to provision and configure an instance of IBM Cloud Databases for Redis.

features.title: Create instance of Databases for Redis
features.description: Creates an instance of IBM Cloud Databases for Redis.

features.title: Managing users and roles
features.description: Manage IAM service credentials as well as Databases for Redis admin and default user credentials and roles.

features.title: Autoscaling instance
features.description: Supports rules that allow the Cloud Databases instance to increase resources in response to usage.

features.title: Create service credentials roles
features.description: Create service credentials roles for the instance of Databases for Redis.

features.title: Configure Databases for Redis instance
features.description: Configure Databases for Redis settings to tune database based on the use-case.

features.title: Scaling disk, memory, and CPU
features.description: Adjust the Cloud Databases resources to suit workloads and other needs.

features.title: KMS encryption
features.description: Supports key management encryption (BYOK and KYOK), including service-to-service authorization policies with KMS.

features.title: CBR
features.description: Create context-based restriction (CBR) rules for both Databases for Redis instance.
